About Smart Applicant

Innovative ATS optimization technology from Nigeria

Our Story

Smart Applicant is a product of Zinando Concepts, a leading Nigerian technology company specializing in enterprise software solutions for businesses and office productivity.

Our Mission

We're committed to developing cutting-edge tools that bridge the gap between job seekers and employment opportunities in today's competitive digital landscape.

Our Technology

Using advanced algorithms and machine learning, Smart Applicant analyzes resumes with the same precision as Fortune 500 applicant tracking systems, providing job seekers with actionable insights to improve their chances of landing interviews.
